No. ~210300)} Sub: One Time Settlement of Contractual Disputes on similar lines as (Vivad se Vishwas- II (Contractual Disputes) " under   Ministry of Road Transport and Highways reg: MORTH vide letter No. NH-24028/09/2022-H (E-194788) dated 06.06.2023 forwarded copy of the OM issued by Ministry of Finance, Dept. of Expenditure (DOF) vide their OM No. F.1/7/2022-PPD dated 29.05.2023 to implement one time settlement scheme called "Vivad se Vishwas-Il (Contractual Disputes)" to effectively settle pending disputes  Accordingly, NHAI vide Policy Circular No_ 2.1.60/2023 dated 04.07.2023 issued Standard Operating Procedure to be followed to implement the "Vivad se Vishwas- Il (Contractual Disputes) Scheme. 2 _ MoRTH has issued Office Memorandum No. NH-24028/09/2021-H (E- 194788) dated 18.01.2024 on the subject 'One Time Settlement of contractual disputes on similar lines as "Vivad se Vishwas- Il (Contractual Disputes)" under Ministry of Road Transport and Highways ' A copy of the same is attached as Annexure-| for information and implementation. 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
